Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 21st overall pick, by New York (N) in 1965...
Injured on 6/27/1965 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/10/1967 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from New York (N) to Pittsburgh on 1/31/1968 (Going to PIT: C J. Bench, LF S. Braun, P R. Klimkowski, P B. Moose, P G. Nolan. Going to NYM: LF W. Stargell, P B. Veale)...
Injured on 4/22/1968 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/3/1968 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 4/3/1969...
Had first career hit on 4/7/1969, off Bill Edgerton (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/6/1969, off Eddie Fisher (CHC)...
Injured on 9/2/1972 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/16/1977 to a 3-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/14/1981 to a 3-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
Released by Baltimore on 2/15/1981...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 6/16/1981 to a minor league deal...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/13/1982 to a 3-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
Released by Baltimore on 2/20/1982...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 4/18/1982 to a minor league deal...
